input.content: Take a screenshot and describe what you see on the desktop

tools.name: computer
tools.description: Control a computer by taking screenshots and interacting with UI elements. This tool shows screenshots with numbered elements overlaid on them. Each UI element has been assigned a unique ID number that you can see in the image. Use the element's ID number to interact with any element instead of pixel coordinates.

element_id.description: The ID of the element to interact with (required for click, double_click, move, scroll actions, and as start/end for drag)

start_element_id.description: The ID of the element to start dragging from (required for drag action)

end_element_id.description: The ID of the element to drag to (required for drag action)

text.description: The text to type (required for type action)

keys.description: Key combination to press (required for keypress action). Single key for individual key press, multiple keys for combinations (e.g., 'ctrl+c')

button.description: The mouse button to use for click action (left, right, wheel, back, forward) Default: left

scroll_x.description: Horizontal scroll amount for scroll action (positive for right, negative for left)

scroll_y.description: Vertical scroll amount for scroll action (positive for down, negative for up)
